String: Save and get media using custom tags!
**Right-click any message with media â†’ Apps â†’ "Save to Tagger"**\nThe easiest way to save! No need to copy URLs.
**Save media with tags**\nUsage: `/save url:<url> tags:<tags>`\nExample: `/save url:https://... tags:plumber guh`

**Get media by searching tags**
Usage: `/get tags:<tags>`
Example: `/get tags:plumber guh`
Browse results with Previous/Next click Send to post.

**Delete stored media**
Usage: `/delete tags:<tags>`
Example: `/delete tags:plumber guh`
Browse results and click Delete to remove. Only works for your own media (or if you're an admin).

**Show most used media**
Usage: `/top` or `/top type:<type>`
Example: `/top type:gif`
Browse the most popular media in this server. Public message everyone can see!

â€¢ Lowercase alphanumeric + underscore only
â€¢ Max 50 characters per tag
â€¢ Max 20 tags per media
â€¢ Spaces and commas separate tags
